task.title: Share my screen with others
task.shortdesc: If Instant Share is available to you, you can share an application, a portion of your screen, or your entire screen with colleagues, even if they are not in the same physical location as you. You can also give them control of your shared screen, so that they can navigate through, and even edit, any open documents in the shared portion of your screen. Instant Share participants can also take snap shots of the shared screen to save to their computers.

taskbody.context: To use Instant Share, your administrator must install Sametime Communicate and Sametime Conference.Read here to learn more.
